price: Ɛda no a yεbepia wͻn wͻ ͻhyε so akͻ Amanehunu gya no mu no,
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
